name: Crypt Worlds
storyline: The Goddess Moronia, gentle and benevolent ruler, is in trouble! The dreaded Dendygar has stolen her five goddess relics, rendering her powerless. She drafts the player into acting as her hero, and gives them 50 days to fetch the goddress relics and restore them to their rightful place.
summary: A freeware adventure game that tasks the player to explore a bizarre labyrinth.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: "Crypt Worlds: Your Darkest Desires, Come True" ~Official Trailer~
